name: Lightdash
headline: The open source Looker alternative
description: Lightdash is an open-source Looker alternative. It's built on top of dbt and lets users centralise all their team's business logic in one place.

founders.name: Hamzah Chaudhary, Founder
founders.description:
I've been frustrated with the state of data tools over the last few years, now building Lightdash with a mission to build the data stack for the future of data-driven teams. 

Former Director of Product Management at an insurtech (employee #7), grew the business from seed to Series B, $40M+ funding and >70 employees.

In previous work, I worked with drone analytics technology and launched a late-night food delivery service based in London

founders.name: Oliver Laslett, Founder
founders.description:
Full-stack data enthusiast and all round generalist.

I founded Lightdash: an open-source alternative to Looker.

Before that I was a machine learning engineer in the fintech sector and a PhD in computational physics.

## Data that works for everyone
[Data team](http://lightdash.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Data consumers](http://lightdash.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Leadership](http://lightdash.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
### Build your BI platform with best practices from software engineering
Use software engineering best practices with developer previews, CI/CD and a powerful CLI tool that works with your favourite text editor.
Version controlled semantic layer in git
Easily promote content from staging to production
Automated testing and CI/CD tooling
### Explore complex data with no SQL skills needed
With a simple to use data catalog and explorer, put end users on rails to answer their own questions. Easily share additional context and point out the most relevant data your team should use. And launch your own AI analyst co-pilot to help users achieve their self-serve data needs.
No SQL needed exploration for end users
Build and share reports via intuitive point and click explorer
Create bespoke AI agents and lower the barrier even further
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a9ae93cf7542032ae55b9c/665f3d49537dd56631bbd2f7_8%20\(2\)%20\(1\).avif)
### BI that scales with your business without breaking the bank
Lightdash offers unlimited users and roles for your business, so no more worrying about licenses and seat counts. Easily control data access by group or role and get real-time insights to your teams‚Äô data literacy with tailored insights on how to improve.
Unlimited users and roles across your business
In-depth usage analytics and data literacy statistics
Enterprise-grade security and compliance

### Build your BI platform with best practices from software engineering

**Lightdash: Your Open-Source Looker Alternative**

**Overview:**
Founded in 2020 and based in London, Lightdash is a rising star in the realm of Business Intelligence (BI). As part of Y Combinator‚Äôs S20 batch, they aim to provide a robust, open-source alternative to Looker. The tool leverages dbt, allowing users to consolidate their team's business logic efficiently.

**Mission:**
Lightdash‚Äôs mission is clear: to democratize data exploration through an open-source platform that‚Äôs user-friendly, powerful, and accessible to everyone in the organization. 

**Team and Leadership:**
With a lean team of nine dedicated employees, Lightdash is led by Group Partner Harj Taggar. This small but agile team is focused on delivering rapid innovation and exceptional user support.

**Main Features:**
1. **Self-Service BI:** Lightdash transforms dbt projects into comprehensive BI tools, enabling analysts to define metrics and empowering all team members to interact with data without needing advanced SQL skills.
2. **Metrics-First Approach:** The new 'Spotlight' feature simplifies the discovery and exploration of key metrics, streamlining how users can engage with their data.
3. **Seamless Integrations:** The platform easily integrates with existing tools, enhancing the user experience while ensuring that teams can continue using familiar applications.
4. **Unlimited Users:** One of Lightdash's standout offerings is its flexible pricing model‚Äîwhich eliminates user limits‚Äîmaking it an attractive choice for growing companies.

**Use Cases:**
Smart companies like Workday and Ageras have already recognized the value Lightdash brings. They leverage its intuitive UI and strong developer tooling to improve data accessibility and efficiency across their teams.

**Join the Community:**
For those interested, Lightdash encourages participation in their Slack community where users can connect, share experiences, and influence the product roadmap. 

**Final Thoughts:**
In a landscape fraught with data complexity, Lightdash simplifies the process of business intelligence while offering a collaborative approach through its open-source foundation. It‚Äôs not just another BI tool; it's a gateway to a culture of data-driven decision-making‚Äîaccessible to everyone in your organization.

Explore more at [Lightdash.com](http://lightdash.com/) and see how they can empower your team to harness the power of data! 

--- 

That succinctly covers the essence of Lightdash, its offerings, and the value it brings to businesses looking to democratize their data.
